channel.title: Why does everybody say this?
channel.description: Why does everyone always say not to use any scripts on my main. Are they unsafe, even if they're SRL?

item.title: Why does everybody say this?
item.dc:creator: @YourDistracted YourDistracted
item.description:
@YourDistracted wrote:

LMAO NIRVANA HAHAAHAHAHA. Your a loser. He is saying he doesn’t understand. Someone has been spending to much time on runescape. ~reported? How lame.

item.title: Why does everybody say this?
item.dc:creator: @Martin Martin
item.description:
@Martin wrote:

[quote=“Secet, post:5, topic:70420”][quote author=seto 13 link=topic=103441.msg1054982#msg1054982 date=1174958797]
pluse jagex now is prolly banned anybody for anything whether it be clicking on a rock in tha same place or what they call suspicious behavior those fucking pricks i hope they die or somthing in tha scripts can prolly send a bad ping or lat srry for saying ping but i play to much starcraft like back in aryan when it came up -1
[/quote]

Sorry but I didn’t quite understand you.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Why does everybody say this?
item.dc:creator: @av4td182 av4td182
item.description:
@av4td182 wrote:

yeh, ron summed it up quite nicely. autoing does cause heaps of bans and to have your main banned after all those hard hours of trainin would be a real pain.

Read full topic

item.title: Why does everybody say this?
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Scripts are never perfect. There is always a chance that the scripter or something else can fuck up and then your character is nailed to a cross. So as a precaution, everyone forewarns you by saying “Do not use scripts on your main! You will be sorry!”.

Read full topic
